overview: Sweetheart Video's popular series Lesbian Stepmother is back with more forbidden seduction. Enjoy four taboo vignettes of stepmothers fantasizing about their stepdaughters. Debbie (Emily Addison) takes advantage of her husband's absence to seduce her busty stepdaughter Maria (Jenna Foxx). Nancy (London River) turns a quiet sunbath into a torrid night when her husband's daughter Gabbie (Hime Marie) shows up. Stacey (Silvia Saige) teaches Emily (Adria Rea) all her billiard techniques. Now it's Emily's turn to show Stacey a few tricks on her own. Finally, Carmen (Dana DeArmond) falls for her innocent and sexy stepdaughter Tracy (Nia Nacci). These four young stars will leave you craving more mommy time!
title: Lesbian Stepmother 6
